source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a digitally rendered, sweeping aerial view of a city resembling Paris, complete with the Eiffel Tower in the background. A massive and intricate red roller coaster track winds its way through the city streets, weaving between and over the buildings. The camera slowly pans and tilts, providing a dynamic fly-through perspective of this fantastical cityscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
